description:
About us

Marshfield Chevrolet is a small business in Marshfield, MO. We are professional, agile, innovative and our goal is to Continue to provide southwest Missouri with quality vehicles at a great price..

Our work environment includes:
• Modern office setting
• Growth opportunities

If you're an ambitious, motivated and energetic professional, then we want to meet you! We are seeking a high-energy individual with a love of people to join our team of Sales Consultants. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining a large client base and selling retail products to consumers. The ideal candidate for this position is comfortable in a high-pressure environment and is willing to travel up to 70 percent of the time.

Responsibilities:
• Master the use of the company's software.
• Be familiar with the company's product line.
• Sell products or services to customers.
• Stay in regular contact with customers to develop and maintain a relationship.
• Be familiar with current company policies and procedures.
• Communicate with customers on a regular basis to learn what they need from the company.
• Research industry trends and developments in order to stay on top of news that may affect sales.
• Keep up on regulations affecting the industry.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $45,000.00 - $100,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Dental insurance
• Employee discount
• Flexible schedule
• Health insurance
• Mileage reimbursement
• Paid time off
• Paid training
• Parental leave
• Vision insurance

Compensation package:
• Bonus opportunities
• Commission pay
• Monthly bonus

Schedule:
• Monday to Friday
• Weekends as needed

License/Certification:
• Driver's License (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
